member.name: IUserAccountChangeCallback.OnPictureChange
member.summary: Called to send notifications when the picture that represents a user account is changed.
member.param: Pointer to a string that contains the user name. Set this parameter to NULL to specify the current user.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IUserAccountChangeCallback
member.summary: Exposes a method which is called when the picture that represents a user account is changed.
